name: Politicat
description:
Politicat 

Save the world !

You are Agent 47 and in cooperation with Agent 46 you'll have to save the world by soothing the world secret dirigeant !

It's a coop game where you have player one that play the character in the game and player 2 that have to guide player 1 during the soothing process

Player 2 have a manual include in game file

Developper : Noé Gigi

3D Artist : Steve Bové

3D Artist : Naomi Dubois

Game Designer : Grégoire Calonne

Manual is only in Fr by now i'll upload the En trad later
